Chapter 3 External Resources This is a long list of helpful external resources, from books to URLs to exercises, etc. 3.1 Graphical Data Analysis with R This book (Unwin 2015) systematically goes through the different types of data, including categorical variables, continuous variables, and time series. The author shows different examples of plotting techniques using ggplot and promoting the “grammar of graphics” model. Code snippets included and available at the book’s website (http://rosuda.org/GDA). 3.2 Cheatsheet of cheatsheets Paul van der Laken (Laken 2018) has put together a large collection of R resource links, including cheatsheets, style guides, package info, blogs, and other helpful resources. (https://paulvanderlaken.com/author/lakenp/)
